Name: Two Wars - Part 1
About the game: About this game Two Wars is an interactive (non-visual) novel, set in the aftermath of an alien invasion and the almost complete annihilation of the human race. With no word on being rescued and supplies running out, a band of survivors are soon more at each others throats than at their enemies. Details This is a short two part story, with the first part consisting of four chapters (coming soon) Features music by Kevin MacLeod (Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0) and Josh Woodward, with title graphics by Javier-Rodriguez
Meta Title: Two Wars - Part 1: Jul 9, 2018, Triority and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Two Wars - Part 1? Check out the release date (Jul 9, 2018), developer insights from Triority, and a complete game summary.
